channel.title: Develop mods for Black Mesa
channel.description: I wondered today whether it's possible to develop mods for Black Mesa with the Source SDK. I don't own half life, I just have Black Mesa and the Source SDK 2007 installed. There are some Threads on this topic, but they describe how to use for example Hammer Editor with Black Mesa, but they all use the half life 2 directory in the Game Configuration! Hope you can help me!
